liquidity.new_pair_warn: You are Creating a new Pair! The ratio of Tokens you add below will set the initial price of this pool. If The pool you are creating includes {{token}} it will automatically be eligible to Mint UP tokens.
liquidity.share_of_pool_tooltip: This will be your participation in the pool after the operation
liquidity.no_pools_matching_criteria: There are no pools matching your criteria
liquidity.pools_description:
Liquidity providers earn a share of the fees generated by the uPair where the liquidity is provided. Fees are shared in the form of UP tokens. UP tokens earn a share of the trading fees generated by every trade and from the entire Unifi protocol

For more information check the docs.
up.redeem_description: Redeeming UP tokens means to send UP tokens to the Unifi protocol. The protocol will return a predetermined amount of base tokens for that blockchain in exchange for the UP tokens. Redeeming UP tokens is an irreversible transaction.
super_pair_tag.tooltip: {{tokenA}/{{tokenB}} Liquidity Providers earn bonus liquidity rewards from all UP minting pairs.
up_mintable_tag.tooltip: Liquidity providers of this pair earn a share of trading fees in the form of UP token, which can be redeemed for an ever increasing value.
up_mr_tag.tooltip_body: % of the pool trading fee gathered to mint UP token.
token_list_modal.search_or_paste_token_a: Search token or type token address
swap_config_modal.slippage_body: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage
swap_config_modal.deadline_body: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this period of time
slippage_warning.text_1: Supplying Single Side Liquidity will use the provided token to buy the other token in this pair.
slippage_warning.text_2: This buy may incur significant slippage if there is not enough liquidity in this pool, resulting in a significant difference in price executed and the quoted price. You may set the maximum amount of slippage you will tolerate (current {{slippage}}%) by clicking the slider icon at the top right. Be careful to manage this risk accordingly.
connection_modal.select_a_wallet: Select a wallet to start operating in our platform
choose_network_modal.currently_browsing: You are currently browsing on the {{networkName}} network.
exchange.add_liquidity_to_receive_lp_or_: Add liquidity to receive LP token or Create a new pool
exchange.not_participating_in_pool: You are not participating in any pool
exchange.dont_see_joined_pool: Don't see a pool you have joined?
exchange.swap_button_status_price_impact: Price Impact for this trade is very high
exchange.swap_button_status_no_route: No available route for selected trade
pending_transactions_list.pending_tx_on_: You have transactions on the following accounts:
